PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-12402008-06-18,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MICHAEL J. TIMS of Calgary, Alberta, as Vice-Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Robert J. Perry.
AttachmentsAttachment
